dialect.name: Tilt
dialect.description: A multi-service development environment for teams that deploy to Kubernetes

symbols.name: docker_build

params.name: ref
params.doc: The name for the image to be built. Must be a valid docker image reference.

params.name: context
params.doc: The build context for the Docker image. Defaults to the current directory.

params.name: dockerfile
params.doc: Path to the Dockerfile relative to the build context.

params.name: build_args
params.doc: Build-time variables that are accessible to the dockerfile during build.

params.name: target
params.doc: Name of the target build stage to build.

params.name: ssh
params.doc: SSH agent socket or keys to expose to the build.

symbols.doc: Builds a Docker image from a Dockerfile. This is one of the most common ways to build container images in Tilt.

symbols.name: k8s_yaml

params.name: yaml
params.doc: Path(s) to Kubernetes YAML files to apply.

params.name: allow_duplicates
params.doc: Allow duplicate Kubernetes objects across different calls to k8s_yaml.

symbols.doc: Deploys Kubernetes YAML to the cluster. The YAML files will be applied in the order specified.

symbols.name: k8s_resource

params.name: workload
params.doc: The name of a Kubernetes workload (Deployment, Job, etc.)

params.name: image
params.doc: The name of an image built with docker_build.

params.name: port_forwards
params.doc: Local ports to connect to the Kubernetes resource.

params.name: resource_deps
params.doc: A list of resources that this resource depends on.

symbols.doc: Configures how Tilt manages a Kubernetes resource. Links images to workloads and sets up port forwarding.

symbols.name: local_resource

params.name: name
params.doc: The name of the local resource.

params.name: cmd
params.doc: The command to run locally.

params.name: deps
params.doc: Files or directories that this resource depends on.

params.name: ignore
params.doc: Files or directories to ignore when watching for changes.

params.name: resource_deps
params.doc: A list of resources that this resource depends on.

params.name: serve_cmd
params.doc: A command that starts a long-running process.

symbols.doc: Runs a local command. Use this for build scripts, database migrations, or any other local development tasks.

symbols.name: load

params.name: file
params.doc: Path to the Tiltfile extension to load.

symbols.doc: Loads and executes another Tiltfile or Tiltfile extension. Similar to Python's import statement.

symbols.name: include

params.name: file
params.doc: Path to another Tiltfile to include.

symbols.doc: Includes another Tiltfile in the current one. The included file runs in the same scope.

symbols.name: config
symbols.doc: The Tilt configuration object. Used to parse command-line arguments and configuration files.
